span.br: Notice is hereby given by the Dolgeville Central School District that the Annual Meeting and General Election scheduled for Tuesday, May 19th is hereby postponed until at least June 1, 2020 and the circulation, filing, and collection of petitions for the Board of Education position is postponed pursuant to the New York State Governor’s Executive Order 202.13. Further notice will be given when more information is available.
